TemporalDirections.TEXT: 279,VANESSA,We went to law school together.,1.0,S01E01,1.0 280,ELAINE,"(interrupting Jerry's conversation) Oh, Jerry!",1.0,S01E01,1.0 281,JERRY,"(turning to Elaine; thinking) Oh no, not now.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 282,ELAINE,I had this dream last night and you were in it.,1.0,S01E01,1.0 283,JERRY,"Oh really? (tries turning away in the hopes Elaine gets the hint; thinking) Oh God, I gotta get out of this.",1.0,S01E01,1.0 284,ELAINE,"You were you, but, you werent you...",1.0,S01E01,1.0 285,JERRY,"No kidding. (thinking) Why is this happening? Please, make her stop!",1.0,S01E01,1.0 286,ELAINE,"I think, I think we were in my house where I grew up, and you were standing there, you were looking out the window...",1.0,S01E01,1.0 287,JERRY,(thinking) This is brutal.,1.0,S01E01,1.0 288,ELAINE,You turned around and you had these wooden teeth.,1.0,S01E01,1.0

DIALOGUE.text: Oh God, I gotta get out of this.
